topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558b3d55636872727c002dfe#post_558b3d55636872727c002dfe
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558b39fc636872727c002780#post_558b39fc636872727c002780
15 Days until Squiggy shits on it. [/bq]
No shit sherlock.

Not to sound like a ass, but sometimes whenever someone gay shits on hetero fan service that pisses me off, whenever someone straight shits on same sex fan service that pisses me off.

"Ewww straight relationships!"
"Ewww gay relationships!
"Ewww lesbian relationships!"

It legitimately makes me angry as fuck whenever people do this crap.  I don't mean as in being argumentative on the internet fake angry, but like actually annoyed as fuck.


I may lean drastically more towards women, but my thoughts on sexuality in mass media: I like penis, vagina, butts and boobs.
Yuri?  Good
Yaoi?  Good
Hetero?  Good


How the internet constantly fucking complains about that sort of thing is why we don't have more same sex relationships/canon shipping in fictional media:
If you have a gay couple in fiction people constantly fucking complain about it.
If you have a lesbian couple in fiction people constantly fucking complain about it.
If you have a hetero couple in fiction people constantly fucking complain about it.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
